description.cs:
Veľká rodina Lombardi bola kedysi na vrchole impéria. Po smrti jej patriarchu sa osud rodiny a Firentie - nemanželskej dcéry, sa rúca do záhuby rukami jej neužitočných a krutých bratrancov. Jej otec zomrel, príbuzní ju vyhodili na ulicu a významná rodina, na ktorú bola taká hrdá, bola úplne zničená... Keď sa však prevtelí do svojho sedemročného ja, bude sa snažiť ochrániť česť rodiny, získať si priazeň starého otca Lulaca a zabrániť smrti vlastného otca. V tomto živote pre ňu existuje len jeden spôsob, ako zvíťaziť: stať sa hlavou ich mocného rodu.

---

description.en:
I've reincarnated as Firentia Lombardy, the illegitimate daughter of the wealthiest and most influential family in the Empire. I thought I was all set to have a comfortable and luxurious life… but it wasn't long before my beloved father died, my relatives kicked me out, and our family went bankrupt!!

To add insult to injury, I was hit by a carriage one day when I drank (a bit too much) booze to drown my sorrows… but my despair was only temporary. When I opened my eyes, I found that I'd traveled back in time to when I was 7 years old!

I was surprised to see my father again in the flesh. But as if that wasn't already shocking enough, the 2nd prince, our family's once sworn enemy, was now following me around like a dog!

Now that I've been given a second chance at life, I'll take things into my own hands and claim both the 2nd prince and my family for myself!

---
**Links:**
* Alternative Official English - [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/i-shall-master-this-family), [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/9247)
description.fr:
Florentia s'est réincarnée comme l'enfant illégitime de la famille la plus riche de l'empire, même si elle n'était pas de sang pure elle pensait que tout irait bien, son père était gentil avec elle, mais à la mort de ce dernier sa famille l'a abandonnée et elle s'est retrouvée seule, puis soudainement le trou noir.

Elle se souvient d'avoir un peu bu puis avoir ressenti un violent coup sur la tête et maintenant elle est de retour dans son corps de 7 ans! L'occasion de tout changer et de devenir même en étant illégitime la cheffe de la famille!

---
La grande famille Lombardi était autrefois au sommet de l’Empire. Après la mort de son patriarche, le sort de la famille et celui de Firentia, née d’un Lombardi et d’un paysan, tombent en ruine aux mains de ses cousins inutiles et cruels. Mais lorsqu’elle se réincarne à l’âge de ses sept ans, elle fera tout pour protéger l’honneur de la famille, gagner les faveurs de son grand-père Lulac et, empêcher la mort de son père. Dans cette vie, il n’y a qu’un seul moyen pour elle de gagner: devenir la cheffe de leur puissante famille.

---

description.id:
Aku pikir aku adalah putri bangsawan yang hidupnya bergelimang harta dan kebahagiaan, tapi ternyata aku ini anak berdarah campuran bangsawan dan rakyat biasa yang keberadaannya tidak dianggap dalam keluargaku sendiri. Ibuku sudah tiada dan tidak ada yang menyayangiku kecuali ayahku sendiri. Setelah bekerja keras mengabdikan diri untuk keluarga ini, siapa sangka aku malah diusir dan berakhir mati tertabrak kereta kuda. Ketika terbangun lagi aku bereinkarnasi untuk kedua kalinya di tubuh yang sama.

description.ja:
今度こそ守れるんじゃないかな？ ランブル帝国随一の家門、ロンバルディを！ 交通事故で死んだ後ロンバルディ家の婚外子として転生したフィレンティア。 だが…彼女を待ち受けていたのは愛する父の死とロンバルディ家の滅亡だった。 家門の滅亡を知った日に彼女は酒を飲んで馬車に轢かれてしまうのだが、目を覚ますと7歳の自分に戻っていた。 今度こそ父と家門を守り抜くと決めたフィレンティア。 彼女を待ち構える試練とは一体何なのか… 当主になると決めた彼女の挑戦が始まるーー！

description.ko:
“한번 해 보자, 내가 가주가 되는 거야.”
환생에 회귀까지, 인생 3회차 피렌티아의 가주 되기 프로젝트!

제국 제일가는 명문가 롬바르디가의 막내 손녀 ‘피렌티아’. 그녀는 똑똑하고 능력 있지만 사생아로 태어났다는 이유로 친척들에게 온갖 수모를 당하고, 결국 가문에서 쫓겨나고 만다. 이후 피렌티아는 더 이상 가문 일에 참여할 수 없게 되고, 그저 무능력한 큰아버지의 손에 롬바르디가가 망해가는 것을 지켜볼 수밖에 없었다. 화가 나 술을 진탕 마신 어느 날, 피렌티아는 마차 사고를 당해 죽음을 맞이하는데…. 그러나 어떻게 된 일인지 눈을 떠 보니 거울에 비친 것은 일곱 살 때의 모습?! 전생의 기억을 가지고 회귀한 피렌티아는 다시 찾은 생에서는 롬바르디가의 멸문을 막기 위해 스스로 가주가 되기로 결심하는데…!

---

description.uk:
"...спробуймо. Я очолю цю родину." Фірентія переродилася позашлюбною дитиною аристократа Ломбарді - наймогутнішої родини в імперії. Ба більше, історія цього роду тотожна історії держави Лембру! Ломбарді, знамениті своїми статками, обросли зв'язками та стали надійними покровителями для талановитих людей. Здавалось, що на Фірентію чекає світле майбутнє... Але її батько помер, а родичі, які прогнали дівчину, розвалили впливовий дім! Трохи (ні) випивши, вона потрапила під екіпаж на шляху додому. "Це занадто..." Фірентія знову розплющила очі семирічною дівчинкою. Тепер вона може врятувати татка і свою родину? А другий принц бігає за нею, немов відданий пес? Гаразд, тоді другий принц і дім Ломбарді належать їй!

---

description.vi:
Gia đình vĩ đại Lombardy, đã một thời đứng đầu đế quốc. Sau cái chết của chủ gia đình, số phận của gia đình và của cả Firentia, sinh ra từ một Lombardy và thường dân, rơi vào tay những anh em họ độc ác và vô dụng của cô ấy. Nhưng khi Firentia quay về cơ thể của mình vào năm 7 tuổi, cô ấy sẽ làm hết sức để bảo vệ danh dự của gia đình, lấy lòng người ông nội Lulac, và ngăn chặn cái chết của cha mình. Trong lần này, chỉ có một đường để Firentia thắng: trở thành mẫu hệ của gia đình vĩ đại này.

---

意外穿成为了帝国最声名鼎盛的第一家族的私生女。虽然蒂亚头脑出众，也积累了大量的实战经验，但最终在爷爷去世后被叔叔扫地出门，而无能的叔叔很快便败光了家族的产业…… 意外死亡后，又一次重新回了小时候——这一世，蒂亚决定成为家主，重新让家族站上帝国巅峰！

description.pt-br:
Florentia reencarnou como filha ilegítima da família mais rica do império. Ela pensou que tudo iria bem no futuro. Mas seu pai havia falecido, seus parentes a deixaram na porta, e a família honrada de que ela tanto se orgulhava estava completamente arruinada…. Mas isso é real? Ela bebeu um pouco (muito) e foi atropelada por uma carruagem, Quando ela abriu os olhos novamente, ela tinha sete anos? Além disso, o Segundo Príncipe, que era inimigo de sua família em sua vida anterior, está seguindo-a como um cachorro!

---

title.en: I'm Being Mistaken for a Soccer Genius

description.en: The Korean boy, Lee Jian, who was released from a prestigious youth team in Italy, spends his days idling away as a substitute even after arriving at the youth team of AC Firenze, almost as if he were running away.As usual, he boasts to his childhood friend, Kim Jiwoo, claiming to be a genius, but then he hears the shocking news that Jiwoo is coming to Italy to study abroad. Determined not to disappoint his precious (?) friend Jiwoo, Jian sets his sights on becoming a starter...

description.en:
Vilified by others as a "witch", Evris, the youngest daughter of the House of Bradley, is engaged to Mark, the fifth prince of the Kingdom of Klengel. When he abruptly announces that their engagement is broken off, Evris is plunged into despair. However, someone reaches out to her instead... The cross-dressing crown prince (♀) of a neighboring country!?

This is the story of a red-haired witch who manipulates shadows and a cross-dressing crown prince (♀) who is serving as a body double for her missing older brother. 

The curtain rises on a fantasy romantic comedy of a girl being teased by a princess!

Serialization began in the July 2023 issue of *Yuri Hime*.
description.ja:
「魔女」と罵られるブラッドリー家の末娘・イヴリスは、婚約相手であるクレンゲル王国第5王子・マルクに突然の婚約破棄を宣言されていた。絶望のどん底に落とされるイヴリス。しかし、そんな彼女に手を差し伸べるのは…隣国の男装皇太子!?
影を操る赤髪の魔女令嬢と失踪した兄の影武者となる男装皇子。
王子様系女子に翻弄されるファンタジーラブコメ開幕！
description.ru:
Эйвери, младшая дочь дома Брэдли, проклинаемая окружающими как "ведьма", помолвлена с Марком, пятым принцем королевства Кленгель. Когда он неожиданно объявляет, что их помолвка расторгнута, Эйвери впадает в отчаяние. Однако кто-то протягивает ей руку помощи... Наследный принц (♀) соседней страны?!

Это история о ведьме, управляющей тенями, и о переодетом наследном принце (♀), который является двойником пропавшего старшего брата.

Занавес приподнимается над фэнтезийной романтической комедией о девушке, которую дразнит принцесса!
description.tr:
Bu, gölgeleri manipüle eden kızıl saçlı bir cadı ile kayıp ağabeyinin dublörü olarak rol yapan melez veliaht prensin hikâyesidir.

Diğerleri tarafından “cadı” olarak lanetlenen Bradley Hanesi’nin en küçük kızı Evris, Klengel Krallığı’nın beşinci prensi Mark ile nişanlıdır. Mark aniden nişanı bozduğunu açıklayınca Evris umutsuzluğa kapılır. Ancak biri ona yardım elini uzatacaktır… Komşu ülkelerden birinin karşı cinsin kıyafetlerini giymeyi seven veliaht prensi!? Bir prenses tarafından dalga geçilen bir kızın fantastik romantik komedisinde perde açılıyor!

description.en:
A sweet essay by a real-life couple, that attracted a lot of attention on SNS, is now being serialized on Yuri-Hime!

Koharu and Minato are a long-distance couple who finally got the chance to live together. Their lovey-dovey daily life, even with a 10-year age difference, will heal you from the fatigue of modern life...!
description.es-la: El dulce ensayo de una pareja real, que está causando sensación en las redes sociales, comienza a ser serializado en Yuri Hime! Koharu y Minato, una pareja a larga distancia, empiezan a vivir juntas, cumpliendo su sueño. La vida amorosa de estas dos chicas con una diferencia de edad de 10 años, ¿¡será un remedio eficaz para el cansancio diario de la vida moderna...!?
description.pt-br:
Um doce ensaio de um casal da vida real, que atraiu muita atenção no SNS, agora está sendo serializado na Yuri-Hime!

Koharu e Minato são um casal distante que finalmente teve a chance de morar juntos. Seu cotidiano amoroso, mesmo com 10 anos de diferença de idade, vai te curar do cansaço da vida moderna...!

description.en:
After the fall of the empire due to the homunculi, Evienrose, the 7th Princess, dies after drinking poison given by her younger sister who has taken their side. When she opens her eyes again, she has returned 8 years to the past. To stop the fall of the imperial family, Eve decides to turn 'Mikhael', the leader of the homunculi and the 'Monster of the Floating Prison', into her appointed knight.

"Mikhael, I need you, very much."

---
Princess Evienrose, despite advocating fiercely for the rights of the homunculi rebels, now awaits death at their hands… that is until she is poisoned by her own sister! Awakening eight years in the past, Eve now has one goal: become the Empress and liberate the homunculi to stop the rebellion from ever happening! To do this, she appoints the rebel king himself, Mikaelis Agnito, as her personal knight. But with Eve’s scheming sisters standing in the way, the fight for the crown is on, and the fate of the Hadelamid empire rests in her hands!

---
The seventh imperial princess, Evenrose, once died. Her last memory was of the royal family was destroyed by the Homunculus, the rebelling slaves, and of her sister who had sided with the rebels and urged her to escape her painful execution by swallowing poison. But when she opened her eyes again, "I...I'm not dead." She realizes that she had gone eight years back in time, back to a time before her cruel sister Bridgette was chosen as the next emperor. Given the opportunity to prevent the fall of the imperial family by being chosen as the next emperor herself, she decides to write her own article about Michael, the king of Homunculus and the monster of public prison, in order to win the emperor's heart. "I need you, Michael. Very badly." Will Evenrose be able to get him and protect the imperial family safely?

---

description.es:
La séptima princesa imperial, Evenrose, murió una vez.Su último recuerdo fue cuando la familia real fue destruida por el Homúnculo, quien provocó la traición y se ahogó en el plan de su hermano parado de su lado, al tragar veneno. Pero cuando volvió a abrir los ojos,"Yo ... no estoy muerto."Se da cuenta de que ha vuelto al pasado y que era ocho años más joven. Fue antes de que el tercer emperador, que será el próximo heredero, fuera elegido oficialmente como sucesor. Una oportunidad para evitar la caída de la familia imperial presionando al tercer emperador Bridgette y siendo reconocida como sucesora. Como parte de la preparación, Evenrose decidió escribir su propio artículo sobre Michael, el rey de Homunculus y el monstruo de la prisión pública, para ganarse el corazón del emperador."Te necesito, Michael. Muy desesperadamente."¿Podrá Evenrose atraparlo y proteger a la familia imperial de manera segura?

---

description.fr:
Il était une fois, un royaume où grâce à une alchimie interdite, des homonculus étaient créés.

Ces homonculus devaient se soumettre à la volonté de la famille Impériale à l’aide d’une magie d’asservissement. Les plus doués d’entre eux faisaient partie de la garde du château et parmi eux, la famille Impériale devait en choisir un pour en faire leur chevalier personnel. Mais un homonculus résista au sort de l’Empereur: Mikhaelis Agnito.

Il organisa une rébellion, souleva les homonculus contre l’empire et exécuta toute la famille Impériale à l’exception de la 7ᵉ princesse, Evenrose et la 8ᵉ princesse, Rosenite. Cette dernière, éperdument amoureuse de Mikhaelis, croyait qu’elle portait en elle le «résultat de leur amour.» Elle pensait être exceptionnelle mais elle n’était en vie qu’uniquement parce qu’elle avait subit une expérience avec la pierre philosophale, qui ne fonctionnait seulement qu’avec le sang royal. Une simple marionnette que Mikhaelis pouvait contrôler à sa guise.

Cependant, le traître avait des sentiments pour Evenrose, car elle était différente. Elle était contre l’utilisation des homonculus comme esclaves et étudia durement pour leur rendre leur liberté, faisant d’elle le mouton noir de la famille Impériale. Malheureusement, elle ne comprit pas les actions de Mikhaelis et croyait qu’elle allait se faire exécuter comme les siens.
Rosenite en profita pour venir la voir et l’empoisonner, se réjouissant de la mort de sa demi-sœur, pensant avoir Mikhaelis pour elle seule. En apprenant la nouvelle de la mort d’Evenrose, Mikhaelis tente alors par tous les moyens de la ressusciter. Un mage lui proposa un moyen: celui de retourner dans le temps. Néanmoins, seule Evenrose gardera les souvenirs de tout ce qui c’était passé jusqu’à présent. Mikhaelis accepta sans sourciller, du moment que sa bien aimée était en vie. Quand le sort se lança, Evenrose ouvrit les yeux et se retrouva 8 ans en arrière.

Sera-t-elle capable de changer son destin?

---

description.id:
Putri kekaisaran ketujuh, Evenrose, pernah meninggal. Kenangan terakhirnya adalah tentang keluarga kerajaan yang dihancurkan oleh Homunculus, para budak yang memberontak, dan tentang saudara perempuannya yang telah memihak para pemberontak dan mendesaknya untuk melarikan diri dari eksekusi menyakitkannya dengan menelan racun. Tapi ketika dia membuka matanya lagi, "Aku... aku tidak mati." Dia menyadari bahwa dia telah pergi delapan tahun yang lalu, kembali ke masa sebelum saudara perempuannya yang kejam, Bridgette, dipilih sebagai kaisar berikutnya. Diberi kesempatan untuk mencegah jatuhnya keluarga kekaisaran dengan dipilih sendiri sebagai kaisar berikutnya, dia memutuskan untuk menulis artikelnya sendiri tentang Michael, raja Homunculus dan monster penjara umum, untuk memenangkan hati kaisar. "Aku membutuhkanmu, Michael. Sangat buruk." Akankah Evenrose bisa mendapatkannya dan melindungi keluarga kekaisaran dengan aman?

---

description.it:
La settima principessa imperiale, Evienrose, una volta morì e l'ultima cosa che ricorda fu quando la famiglia reale venne distrutta dagli Homunculi, e il tradimento della sorellina. Ma quando riaprì gli occhi si rende conto di essere tornata nel passato e di avere otto anni in meno, e ha così l'opportunità di impedire la caduta della famiglia imperiale incalzando il terzo imperatore Bridgette e facendosi riconoscere come successore. Come parte del piano, Evienrose ha deciso di avere dalla sua parte Mikhaelis Agnito, il futuro re degli Homunculus. "Ho bisogno di te, Mikhaelis." Riuscirà Evienrose a riuscirci e a proteggere la famiglia imperiale?

description.ja:
人造人間「ホムンクルス」の反乱によって滅びたハーデルラミド皇室。第7皇女イヴは妹の裏切りによって１度は命を落としたものの、錬金術の力で８年前の世界で再び目を覚ます。 イヴが皇室滅亡の未来を変えるための方法―それは皇室を滅亡に追い込んだホムンクルスの王・ミカエルを自らの専属騎士にすることだった。 皇女と反逆者、前世ではすれ違ってばかりだった２人が向かう未来とは——！

description.ko:
7황녀 이뷔엔로즈는 한 번 죽음을 맞이했다.그녀의 마지막 기억은 반역을 일으킨 호문클루스들에 의해 황실이 망하고그들의 편에 선 동생의 계략에 빠져 독약을 삼키고 죽었던 기억이었다. 그런데“나…… 안 죽었어……?”다시 눈을 떴을 때, 그녀는 자신이 8살이나 어려진 채 과거로 돌아왔다는 사실을 깨닫는다.그것도 다음 대 후계자가 되는 3황녀가 정식으로 후계자로 낙점되기 전으로.‘이건 기회야.’3황녀 브리지테를 누르고 후계자로 인정받아 황실의 몰락을 막을 기회.그 대비의 일환으로 이브는 황제의 마음을 얻고 자신의 가능성을 시험하기 위해호문클루스들의 왕이자 공중감옥의 괴물 ‘미카엘’을 자신의 기사로 들이기로 하는데.“미카엘 그대가 필요해. 아주 절실하게 말이야.”과연 이뷔엔로즈는 그를 얻고, 무사히 황실을 지켜낼 수 있을까.

---

После падения императорской семьи от рук гомункулов, седьмая принцесса Ивенроуз умирает, выпив яд, предложенный сестрой. Очнувшись, она узнает, что вернулась на восемь лет назад и решает сделать Михаэлиса, короля гомункулов и чудовища, своим личным рыцарем, чтобы предотвратить восстание и гибель своего рода.

description.en:
Faceless shadow nobles living in a vast mansion, attended by living dolls who spend much of their time cleaning up the soot endlessly emitted by their mysterious masters.  
  
Follow the story of Emilyko, a young and cheerful living doll, as she learns her duties serving as the attendant for Kate Shadow-sama. What dangers and dark secrets will she and Kate encounter, as they become more deeply involved in the inner workings of the shadows' society?
description.es:
Nobles sombras sin rostro que viven en una vasta mansión, atendidos por muñecos vivientes que pasan gran parte de su tiempo limpiando el hollín emitido por sus misteriosos maestros.  
  
Sigue la historia de Emilyko, una joven y alegre muñeca viviente, mientras aprende sus deberes como asistente de Kate Shadow-sama.
description.ja: 不思議な洋館に住む、 顔のないシャドー一族と、 世話係の“生き人形”たち。 彼らが織りなす、 摩訶不思議な日常とは…？
description.ru: Безликие теневые дворяне, живущие в огромном особняке, сопровождаемые живыми куклами, которые проводят большую часть своего времени, очищая сажу, бесконечно испускаемую их таинственными хозяевами.
description.es-la: Sombras nobres vivem em uma imensa mansão e são servidos por bonecas vivas que passam a maior parte do tempo limpando a fuligem solta pelos misteriosos mestres. Siga a história de Emilyko, uma boneca viva jovem e animada, enquanto ela aprende seus deveres como serva de Kate Shadow-sama.

title.en: Tensei Youjo. Kamikemono to Ouji to, Saikyou no Ojisan Youhei-dan no Naka de Ikiru.

altTitles.ja: 転生幼女。神獣と王子と、最強のおじさん傭兵団の中で生きる。

altTitles.en: Reincarnated Girl; Living With a Beast, a Prince, and The Strongest Mercenary Group

description.en:
Lise found herself alone in a strange meadow as a young girl. Also, there is a big dog in front of her. There wasn't a dog like that in the neighborhood, and that's when Lise was convinced. 

"I see... This is what they call reincarnation in another world!"

 Then, a group of muscular mercenaries appears in front of Lise. It seems that they have come to defeat this dog. But to her surprise, this dog is a divine beast! Ranagh, the divine beast, has grown fond of Lise, who is the only one who can understand him. So, the leader of the mercenary group, Arlagia, offers to protect Lise and Ranagh with his mercenary group...? 

A young girl, a divine beast, and the strongest group of mercenaries - a wacky otherworldly fantasy with a cast of unorthodox characters!
description.ja: 気が付けば見知らぬ草原にいた優乃。目の前には“神獣”を名乗る大きな犬と屈強な傭兵たち。しかも自分の姿はなぜか幼女に!?「なるほどこれは…異世界転生だ！」即座に状況を理解し、リゼと名乗ることにした彼女が魔法を使ってみるとチートすぎる能力が発覚！ 傭兵団に保護されつつも、ドラゴン狩りに出かけたり、竜巻魔法で新しい料理を開発したりとさっそく大暴れで…？
description.es-la: Lise se encontró sola en un extraño prado con la forma de una niña. Además, hay un gran perro frente a ella. No había ningún perro así en el barrio, y fue entonces cuando Lise se convenció. Ya veo...... ¡Esto es lo que llaman reencarnación en otro mundo!　Entonces, un grupo de mercenarios musculosos aparece frente a Lise. Parece que han venido a derrotar a este perro. Pero para su sorpresa, ¡este perro es una bestia divina!　Ranagh, la bestia divina, se ha encariñado con Lise, que es la única que puede entenderle. Entonces, el líder del grupo de mercenarios, Arlagia, se ofrece a proteger a Lise y a Ranagh con su grupo de mercenarios.....?　Una joven, una bestia divina y el grupo de mercenarios más fuerte. Una extravagante fantasía de otro mundo con un elenco de personajes poco ortodoxos.

altTitles.ja: バトルスタディーズ

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

title.en: Yuusha-sama wa Houshuu ni Hitozuma wo go Kibou desu

altTitles.ja: 勇者さまは報酬に人妻をご希望です

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuusha-sama wa Houshuu ni Hitozuma o go Kiboudesu

altTitles.en: The Hero Wants a Married Woman as a Reward

description.en:
The hero, Chloe, is a strange hero who demands a bounty when saving people. And what makes it different is the prize... He only likes married women, so he demands the prettiest Milf in town.

**"If you want me to save the city, give me your most beautiful married woman!"**

 A unique erotic fantasy story created by a hero!
description.id:
Pahlawan ini keji...!!  Pahlawan, Chloe, adalah pahlawan aneh yang menuntut hadiah saat menyelamatkan orang. Dan yang membuatnya berbeda adalah hadiahnya...Dia hanya senang dengan wanita yang sudah menikah, jadi dia menuntut Milf yang paling cantik di kota. 

"Jika kau ingin aku menyelamatkan kota, berikan aku milf yang paling cantik" 

Sebuah cerita unik fantasi erotis yang dibuat oleh pahlawan!
description.ja: この勇者、下劣ッ…！！勇者・クロエは人々を救う際に報酬を要求する、異質な勇者だった。そして彼が異質なのはその報酬であった…彼は人妻にしか興奮しない為、その町で一番美しい人妻を要求するのであった。「町を救ってほしければ、一番美しい人妻を寄越せ」異色の勇者がおりなすエロファンタジー！

title.en: A Middle-Aged Man Who Returns From Another World Goes Back to When He Was 17 and Becomes Unbeatable

altTitles.ja: 異世界帰りのアラフォーリーマン、17歳の頃に戻って無双する

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Kaeri no Arafour Riiman, 17-sai no Koro ni Modotte Musou suru

description.en:
A black company employee in his 40s, Namba Kazu, died of overwork and was reincarnated to another world. After saving the world, he returns to find himself regressed to his 17-year-old self. 

Kazu realizes that he can use the abilities he acquired from another world and is excited to restart his life over again. However, through the help of his childhood friend, Yui, he learns of the existence of human-eating abomination called Variant in the world he was born in. 

Kazu knows from his past memories that Yui will die in the near future. In order to save Yui, who is on a mission to fight against variants, Kazu decided to throw himself into battle in this world as well.
description.ja:
過労死で異世界に転生したアラフォーリーマンの難波カズ。17歳で異世界を救ったカズは、女神に「元の世界に戻してくれ」と願う。てっきり元のアラフォーリーマンに戻ると思っていたら、17歳の高校生に戻っていた。

それならばと気楽に90年代を満喫しようとしていたが、幼馴染みの由依をきっかけに『人間を喰う異形ヴァリアント』の存在を知り、カズは異世界チートを武器にこの世界でも戦いに身を投じていく…!
description.es-la: Kazu Nanba reencarnó después de la muerte por exceso de trabajo y salvó otro mundo. A la edad de 17 años en el otro mundo después de morir derrotando al rey demonio elije "regresara a su mundo original". Pensó que regresaría a su trabajo normal, pero regreso como un estudiante de secundaria de 17 años. Sin embargo ahora se entera que hay "extrañas criaturas" que matan humanos y donde Kazu recordara un recuerdo pasado donde su amiga de la infancia Yui morirá en un futuro cercano. Esta vez, para salvar a Yui, Kazu usará el poder de otro mundo para lanzarse también a la batalla en este mundo.

altTitles.ja: 監禁王

description.en:
A girl who calls herself a devil appeared before a timid student named Fumio Kijima. The girl claims to be a campaign girl from the demon world and she gives him the ability to "summon a room" from nothing but thin air. At first he doesn't abuse his power and uses it as a convenient ability in his every day life. But one day he is bullied by his classmates under an unfair pretext and is made to suffer. In the past, he would have wallowed in misery and cried himself to sleep, but now he had a power to call upon.

"I will make them regret it!"

Using his powers to summon his "room", he begins his era of confinement and brainwashing to achieve his goals.
description.es: Una chica que se llama a si misma una diabla aparece ante un timido estudiante llamado Fumio Kijima. La chica dice ser una chica de campaña del mundo diablo y le da la habilidad de "invocar una habitación" de la nada. Al principio no abusa su poder y lo usa como una habilidad conveniente en su vida diaria, pero un día es acosado por sus compañeros de clase bajo un pretexto injusto y sufre. En el pasado, se hubiera quedado callado sufriendo y llorando, pero ahora tenía un poder a su disponibilidad. "¡Haré que se arrepientan!" Usando sus poderes para invocar su "habitación," empieza su era de confinar y lavar cerebros para cumplir sus metas.
description.ja: ある日突然、悪魔を名乗る少女が現れ、『何もないところに部屋を作り出す』特殊能力を与えられた。好きだった女子に振られ、加速するいじめの日々に耐えられなかった文雄は、監禁と洗脳による復讐を開始する……
description.pt-br:
Uma garota que se chama de demônio apareceu diante de um estudante tímido chamado Fumio Kijima. A garota afirma ser uma garota de campanha do mundo dos demônios e ela lhe dá a capacidade de “convocar uma sala” do nada além do ar.

A princípio, ele não abusa de seu poder e o usa como uma habilidade conveniente em sua vida cotidiana. Mas um dia ele é intimidado por seus colegas sob um pretexto injusto e é obrigado a sofrer. No passado, ele teria se afundado na miséria e chorado até dormir, mas agora ele tinha um poder para invocar.

“Vou fazê-los se arrepender!”

Usando seus poderes para convocar seu “quarto”, ele começa sua era de confinamento e lavagem cerebral para alcançar seus objetivos.

altTitles.ja: ムジナにの深い

description.en: Am I "necessary" in this world? What is the true nature of the person called "Mujina" who flies in the sky with a sword on her back in the midst of ordinary life? What is man, what is society, what are human rights, and what is happiness?
description.es: ¿Soy "necesario" en este mundo? ¿Cuál es la verdadera naturaleza de la persona llamada "Mujina" que vuela por el cielo con una espada a cuestas en medio de la vida ordinaria...? ¿Qué es el hombre, la sociedad, los derechos humanos y la felicidad...?
description.ja: この世界に、私は”必要”かーー！？何気ない日常の中、刀を背に空を翔ぶ「ムジナ」と呼ばれる者の実体とは…？人間とは、社会とは、人権とは、そして幸せとは…
description.ru: История о юной девушке-убийце с катаной, которая охотится за своими целями в оживлённом столичном городе Цукумо.
description.es-la: ¿Soy "necesario" en este mundo? ¿Cuál es la verdadera naturaleza de la persona llamada "Mujina" que vuela por el cielo con una espada a cuestas en medio de la vida ordinaria...? ¿Qué es el hombre, la sociedad, los derechos humanos y la felicidad...?

description.en: A fun romantic comedy about two characters having fun in various countries all over the world.

altTitles.ja: フェイト/エクストラ CCC FoxTail
フェイト/エクストラ CCC フォックステイル

description.en:
Being flung from the world of Fate/Extra Kishinami Hakuno finds himself in a very strange predicament. Caster Route.  
  
Note: There are no missing chapters. Chapter #32-33 are missing due to a difference in the volume and magazine numbering. Some earlier small chapters were combined in the volumes causing the number difference. Chapter 34 directly follows Chapter 31.
description.pt-br: Sendo expulso do mundo de Fate/Extra Kshinami Hakuno se encontra em uma situação muito estranha. Rota Caster.

description.en: After traveling into a historical BL novel, the actor Lin Yan gains a special ability: fast-traveling through a skill called [Escape Death]. His first mission? To secretly orchestrate an attack on Prince Qi Zhen, which leads to the prince becoming the villain. Lin Yan’s first identity in this world is none other than Lin Shou Yan, the prince’s foolish fiancé. But as he plays his role, he accidentally captures the prince’s heart, and his fake death turns out to be the key reason Qi Zhen becomes a ruthless tyrant! A cold, overthinking tsundere prince and his scheming, perverted fiancé—chaos ensues!

title.en: Musuko ga Kawaikute Shikataganai Mazoku no Hahaoya

altTitles.en: Demon Mother: My Son is so Cute, I Just Can't Help Myself!

altTitles.es-la: La madre demonio indefensa frente a la lindura de su hijo

altTitles.zh: 儿子可爱过头的魔族母亲

altTitles.ja: 息子がかわいくて仕方がない魔族の母親

altTitles.ko: 아들이 귀여워서 어쩔 수 없는 마족엄마

altTitles.tr: Oğlunun Tatlılığına Karşı Koyamayan Bir Şeytan Anne

description.en:
Lorem, an infamous and fearsome demoness, has had to settle down for the sake of Gospel, her baby boy. Try as she might, she is a loving and doting mother, but she remains fearsome to both fellow demon and human onlookers because she retains the dire reputation of her wild and terrible youth years past.

For the sake of motherly love, she has to persevere, to learn and to thrive in a world where she's not alone. For the sake of Gospel and his future.

Feel the Love in it!
description.tr: Bir iblisin kötü günlerini arkada bırakarak, anne olma yolundaki adımlarını anlatan sevimli bir seri.
description.pt-br:
Lorem, uma demônio infame e temível, teve que se estabelecer por causa de Gospel, seu filho. Embora não pareça, ela é uma mãe amorosa e zelosa, mas permanece temível tanto para os companheiros demônios quanto para os espectadores humanos, porque mantém a terrível reputação de sua juventude selvagem e terrível dos anos anteriores.

Pelo bem do amor maternal, ela tem que perseverar, aprender e prosperar num mundo onde não está sozinha. Pelo bem do Evangelho e do seu futuro.

Sinta o Amor nele!

description.en:
The Hellish Romantic Adventure of Apprentice Angel Yu Dante. 

Pre-Serialization work.
#Fantasy #Action #Worldbuilding #SuperpowerBattleSeries #ShonenRoyalRoad

title.en: Yoku Asonda O Niichan Wa Jitsuwa Onna No Kodatta

altTitles.ja: よく遊んだお兄ちゃんは実は女の子だった

altTitles.en: The Nii-Chan I Used To Play With Was Actually A Girl

altTitles.ja: スキップ・ビート!

altTitles.en: Skip Beat

description.en:
Kyouko Mogami lived solely for her childhood friend Shoutaro "Shou" Fuwa. She follows Shou to Tokyo so that he may realize his dream of becoming a famous singer. When his dream is realized, Kyouko overhears the truth behind his decision to bringing her with him: he was using her as a maid.  
  
Shocked and enraged, Kyouko swears to take revenge by outdoing him in show business. With a new look and a new attitude, she joins LME, the agency where Ren Tsuruga (Shou's rival and the #1 actor of LME) works, in the hopes of achieving her goal of destroying Shou's pride.  
  
Along the way, she discovers her true self, makes new friends (and enemies), and finds herself at the heart of some interesting situations that will change her life, and the lives of all others involved, forever.

altTitles.ja: ロックオン

title.en: How to Survive as a Maid in a Horror Game

altTitles.en: Surviving as a Maid in a Horror Game
No Exit Horror

description.en:
"How did you know? I hid it well so that no one would find out."
 
Adrian Caesar von de Paltzgraf, the successor to the Paltzgraf Family. He is hailed as an angel in this world, but only I knew that the serial murders and murder attempts happening in the area which everyone was talking about were all committed by a young, good-looking gentleman.

[Adrian's murderous intent has increased.]
[Convince Adrian to lower his murderous intent. If not, you die.]
[Adrian's murderous intent is at 92%.]

I am the only one who knows. I was the only one who transmigrated into the world of this ridiculous horror game.

---

Note:
- Only Ridibooks has all the volumes, due to Volume 1 of the side stories being R19.
- "No Exit Horror" is the English name on the ebook and physical Korean novel cover.

title.en: 1-Nen Inai ni Ojousama o Kouryaku Suru Maid no Ohanashi

altTitles.ja: 1年以内にお嬢様を攻略するメイドのお話

altTitles.ja-ro: Ichinen Inai ni Ojou-sama o Kouryaku Suru Maid no Ohanashi

altTitles.en: A Story About A Maid Conquering A Young Lady Within A Year
The Nameless flower

description.en: The young master, son of an earl, Luan, while wandering in the forest, met a boy his age. He fell in love with a sweet and kind boy, although he does not know his name. Gradually he began to neglect his training as a successor.
description.fr: Le petit seigneur Luhan, le fils du comte, se perd dans la forêt et rencontre un garçon de son âge. Même s’il ne connaît pas son nom, il tombe amoureux de ce garçon gentil et attentionné, ce qui le distrait progressivement de ses leçons d’héritier.

altTitles.en: Duke's Private Tutor

description.en: Jace, an Academic Honours student, once had a very bright future! However, his life has gone downhill ever since he punched a noble classmate. When he finally manages to get a chance to work as a private tutor… The duke is so handsome that he cannot concentrate!

altTitles.en: Hellper
Hellper season 2
Helper
KBRS
KillBeros

description.en: Indeed it is, indeed it does. A street action comic featuring the life of Jang Gwangnam leading up to the creation of the Killberos Tribe.

title.en: Shibou Yuugi de Meshi wo Kuu.

altTitles.ja: 死亡遊戯で飯を食う。

altTitles.en: The Phantom Girl in Games of Death.
Playing Death Games to Put Food on the Table

altTitles.vi: Kiếm sống bằng trò chơi sinh tử

description.en:
Player name, Yuuki. Seventeen. Place of residence: murder games.

Dressed up in a maid outfit attempting to find her way out of a death mansion, murdering other players clad in a bunny suit, and such to win money is how she makes a living. For some reason, she chose to stay "here" no matter what. 

Overcoming the border between life and death, she aims to attain an unprecedented 「99 Consecutive Wins」.
description.ja:
プレイヤーネーム：幽鬼《ユウキ》
17歳、生業はデスゲーム。

一攫千金、かつ命懸け。参加者は美少女限定。正真正銘、人が死ぬショービジネス。そんな“死亡遊戯”が、天職で、生き甲斐。なんとなく、でも“ここ”に決めた。美しく、容赦なく。めくるめく死線を切り抜けろ。戯れに、切実に。前人未踏の「99連勝」を目指せ!!

altTitles.en: Absolute Reign
Absolute Monarch

description.en:
"I shall devour this Jianghu!"

Says a mysterious son of the fruit merchant, holding the Monarch Sword in his left hand, and the Hell Blade on his right.

Possessing not only eloquence but even an overwhelming martial prowess, what could be his ultimate goal?

The delightful journey of the twenty year old youth, ' Jeok Leegeon', who dreams of dominating the martial world, begins!

title.en: Isekai Mokushiroku Mynoghra: Hametsu no Bunmei de Hajimeru Sekai Seifuku

altTitles.ja: 異世界黙示録マイノグーラ ～破滅の文明で始める世界征服～

altTitles.zh-hk: 異世界默示錄米諾戈拉 ～從滅亡的文明開始的世界征服～

altTitles.en: Apocalypse Bringer Mynoghra: World Conquest Starts with the Civilization of Ruin

description.en:
Bedridden and abandoned, Takuto Ira spent his days in the hospital trying to beat the illness that was slowly killing him. His only solace lay in the nation management strategy game Eternal Nations, where he had built a reputation as the greatest player to ever live. 

After succumbing to his disease, Takuto awoke within the game next to Atou — the Hero unit for his favorite civilization, Mynoghra. Now they’ll set out to conquer the world together (again), one unit, settlement, and level at a time!
description.pl: Ira Takuto umiera w młodym wieku i budzi się w świecie przypominającym jego ulubioną grę 『Eternal Nations』 w której spotyka postać z gry, Atou. Razem postanawiają stworzyć własne królestwo.
description.pt-br: Eu reencarnei como um deus do mal. Ira Takuto sucumbiu à doença em tenra idade e acabou reencarnando em um mundo que lembrava o jogo de simulação de estratégia, “Eternal Nations”, do qual ele adorava jogar quando estava vivo. O que apareceu na frente dele foi Atou, uma garota pertencente à civilização do mal que eu costumava interpretar como “Mynoghra”. Os dois decidiram criar um novo país neste mundo mais uma vez.

title.en: Tamaranai no wa Koi na no ka

altTitles.ja: たまらないのは恋なのか

altTitles.en: Is It Because of Love That I Can't Resist?

description.en: Misuzu became a delinquent through a trivial chance and spends his days getting into fights. One day, Misuzu finds Kitahara, an honor student in a special class, getting involved with some delinquents and helps him out. Kitahara then tries to get involved with Misuzu. Misuzu tries to push him away, saying, "If you get involved with me, the people around you will leave you," but his feelings are wavering...?

altTitles.ja: クールな妻のさーちゃん

altTitles.en: My Cool Wife Saa-chan
My Cool Wife Sa-chan

description.en: A romcom featuring 2 childhood friends who'll get married one day and the process that leads to that point.
description.es: Una comedia romántica protagonizada por dos amigos de la infancia que un día se casarán y el proceso que conduce a ese punto.
description.es-la: Una comedia romántica protagonizada por dos amigos de la infancia que un día se casarán y el proceso que conduce a ese punto.
description.pt-br: Uma comédia romântica com dois amigos de infância que um dia vão se casar e o processo que leva até esse ponto.

title.en: Koibito Ijou no Koto wo, Kanojo Janai Kimi to

altTitles.ja: 恋人以上のことを、彼女じゃない君と。

altTitles.ja-ro: Koibito Ijou no Koto o, Kanojo ja Nai Kimi to

altTitles.en: Being More Than a Lover to You, Who Isn't My Girlfriend
More Than Just a Lover, but Not My Girlfriend
How to Be My Ex-girlfriend's Friend

altTitles.es-la: Cómo ser el amigo de mi exnovia

altTitles.vi: Hơn cả người yêu, dù em không phải bạn gái tôi

description.en:
Having to deal with his abusive boss day after day while working an exploitative job, Yamase Fuyu has become tired of it all... Until one day he accidentally runs into Minase Ito, his ex-girlfriend from university. 

The sudden reunion lifts Fuyu's spirits, who wastes no time inviting Ito to chat over drinks. The two have a whale of a time sharing gripes and reminiscing about the past. But just as Fuyu begins to appreciate their new relationship as "just friends", they end up spending an intimate night together...
description.ja:
元カノと恋人以上の大人の関係…

毎日のように言われる上司からの嫌味とブラックな仕事に山瀬冬は心底疲れきっていた…そんなある日、冬は大学時代の元カノ・糸と偶然の再会を果たす。突然の出会いに嬉しくなった冬は、とっさに糸を呑みに誘い、愚痴や昔話に花を咲かせる。こういう友達関係もいいなと思っていた矢先、二人は一夜の過ちを犯してしまう…。
description.vi: Yamase Fuyu, mệt mỏi triền miên với những lời châm chọc hàng ngày của sếp và công việc bóc lột sức lao động. Một ngày nọ, anh tình cờ gặp lại Ito, người yêu cũ thời đại học. Vui mừng vì cuộc hội ngộ bất ngờ, Fuyu đã rủ Ito đi uống và tâm sự về những chuyện cũ. Họ nghĩ rằng mối quan hệ bạn bè như thế này cũng tốt, nhưng rồi lại phạm phải sai lầm chỉ sau một đêm...
description.es-la:
Fuyu Yamase, un joven adulto cansado de su agotador trabajo llama a su ex novia en la universidad, Ito Minase, para tomar unos tragos. Comieron, rieron, recordaron anécdotas de la universidad; eso hizo que Fuyu piense que esa relación con Ito era perfecta, sin embargo, tragos van, tragos vienen y terminaron ‘haciéndolo’. 

Arrepentido por lo sucedido, Fuyu trata de disculparse con Ito pero ella piensa que está bien lo que sucedió, ya que no hicieron nada malo, al contrario, fue algo divertido porque ambos se sintieron cómodos. Ito estaba cansada de lo complicado que es era ser en la vida por ser una adulta, por lo que ambos deciden tener una relación donde simplemente se diviertan sin preocuparse por el trabajo o el amor.

altTitles.ja: ゴスロリJK無人島漂流記

description.en: On a school trip, two high school girls fell to the sea and washed up on a deserted island. What are they going to do about about food? And clothes? A cute survival 4koma on a deserted island, except for a mysterious creature.
description.ja: 修学旅行の船旅中に、海に投げ出され、無人島に漂着することになった、女子高生が2名。食べ物はどうする?

title.en: Suterare Elf-san wa Sekai de Ichiban Tsuyokute Kawaii!

altTitles.ja: 捨てられエルフさん は世界で一番強くて可愛い！

altTitles.en: The Abandoned Elf is the Strongest and Cutest in the World!

altTitles.hu: A magára hagyott elf lány a világ legerősebb és legaranyosabbja!

description.en:
"Dear top players, this game is a real parallel world. If you reincarnate and save the world, any wish you have will be granted."

Former popular voice actress Ayano responded to the proposal from the goddess. In order to shine as a voice actress once again. Reincarnated as the strongest species of high elf, she aims to "clear the game" in the parallel world with the strongest and cutest kemo-eared heroine using her gaming knowledge, but –!?
description.hu:
**【Egykori toplistás játékos】+【Játékvilág】= Szuper verhetetlen!? Folytatom az életet a legerősebb énemmel!!**

„Kedves top játékosok! Ez a játék egy valós párhuzamos világ. Ha újjászülettek és megmentitek a világot, bármilyen kívánságotokat teljesítjük.”

Erre az istennő ajánlatára válaszolt Ayano, egykori népszerű szinkronszínész. Azért, hogy ismét ragyoghasson szinkronszínészként, a legerősebb faj, a nemes elf egyikeként született újjá. Most, a legerősebb és legaranyosabb állatfüles hősnővel karöltve, játékbeli tudását felhasználva célja a párhuzamos világban a „játék végigjátszása” - de vajon sikerül-e neki!?
description.ja:
「トッププレイヤーの皆様。このゲームは実在する異世界です。転生し、世界を救えばどんな願いも叶えてあげましょう」

女神からの提案に、元人気声優のアヤノは応えた。炎上して干された今、もう一度声優として輝くために。炎上後にゲームをやり込みトップランカーとなったアヤノは、その知識を生かして、最強種【ハイエルフ】に転生! 最強可愛いケモ耳ヒロイン・ホムラとともに異世界での“ゲームクリア”を目指すが、この世界はただの「ゲーム世界」ではないようで――!?

title.en: Yuri Yuri Panic ~Toutosugiru Jian ga Hasseishiteimasu!~

altTitles.ja: ゆりゆりぱにっく～尊すぎる事案が発生しています！～

altTitles.en: Yuri Yuri Panic: An Extremely Precious Affair has Begun

description.en: The most beautiful girl in my class proposes to me, a loner?! On her first day at school, Akari, a plain high school girl, suddenly receives a marriage registration form from the conspicuous Kiyozumi Runa...? A girl-meets-girl school romantic comedy where a girl and her yuri-brained imaginary friend Omochi get caught up in a precious affair!!

altTitles.en: Terror

altTitles.ja: 恐怖

description.en:
Following the life of the student newspaper reporter Emiko, these are scary stories of experiences from Miyako High School :  
- Ubawareta Shinzou (Stolen Heart) – The school's mystery club sees the dangerous consequences of an innocent promise concerning heart donation after death between two friends.   
- Kyuuketsu Men (Bloodsucking Mask) – A girl who wears a demon mask from a shrine for a bad-luck-banishing drama club party ends up unable to remove it.   
- Dokuga (Poison Moth) – The science club leader creates a serum to preserve dead bodies perfectly, but it may have other unpredicted side effects.   
- Henshitsu – A couple take shelter from a storm in a strange house with a secret that might prove to be deadly.   
– These stories and many more are found in the two volumes of Kyoufu. [tethysdust]

altTitles.ja: ののはな語らず

description.en:
A story of a girl named Nonoko and the flowers that bloom in the fields.

When she was young, she showed no interest in wild plants, but recently she has been looking intently at encyclopedias. Looking for a certain flower, when Nonoko goes out to the garden with a pictorial book...

(Source: Natalie, translated)

*Note: Switched from Futabasha's Web Action to Kobunsha's Comic Nettai in December 2024.*

altTitles.ja: おやすみストレイシープ

altTitles.en: Oyasumi Stray Sheep

description.en:
Japan is the country with the shortest sleep time in the world. Despite being born in such a sleep-deprived country, Shinya Moroboshi is an unemployed man who sleeps a lot and lives a self-indulgent life that has nothing to do with lack of sleep. One day, Moroboshi finds an unfamiliar "sleep selling app" on his phone. He uses it with some skepticism, but to his surprise, he is able to actually sell his sleep and make money...!? This is a story that will light up the tomorrow of a deep, never-ending night.

(Source: Comic Zenon, translated)

altTitles.ja: アオアシ

altTitles.th: AOASHI แข้งเด็กหัวใจนักสู้

description.de: Aoi Ashito ist ein Mittelschüler im dritten Jahr aus Ehime. Hinter seinem rohen Spiel verbirgt sich sein immenses Talent, aber Ashito erleidet wegen seiner allzu geradlinigen Persönlichkeit einen großen Rückschlag. Der Manager der Jugendmannschaft des J1-Clubs Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, erscheint vor Ashito. Fukuda sieht Ashitos grenzenloses Potenzial und lädt ihn ein, an den Probespielen seines Teams in Tokio teilzunehmen. Die Geschichte des Jungen, der den Fußball in Japan revolutionieren wird, beginnt sich schnell zu entfalten.
description.en:
Aoi Ashito is a third year middle school student from Ehime. Behind his raw game hides his immense talent 
but Ashito suffers a huge setback because of his overly straightforward personality. 
One day the youth team manager of J1 club Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, appears in front of him. 
Fukuda sees his limitless potential and invites him to take part in his team's tryouts in Tokyo. 
The story of the boy who will revolutionize football in Japan rapidly begins to unfold.  
  
---
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2019**
description.ru: Ашито Аой, ученик третьего класса средней школы из префектуры Эхиме, встречает тренера «Молодежной лиги J» Фукуду Тацую. Несмотря на свою грубость, Ашито обладает таким удивительным потенциалом, что тренер Фукуда приглашает его принять участие в отборочных тестах своей команды в Токио. Взгляните на историю мальчика, который совершит революцию в японском футболе.
description.tr: Aoi Ashito Ehime'de ortaokul 3. sınıfa giden bir öğrencidir. Bir gün karşısına J1 Ligi kulübü Tokyo City Esperion'un altyapı takımı menajeri Fukuda Tetsuya çıkar. Fukuda Aoi'nin sonsuz potansiyelini farkeder ve onu Tokyo'daki altyapı seçmelerine davet eder. Böylece Japon futbolunda devrim yapacak çocuğun hikayesi başlar.
description.pt-br: Ashito Aoi, um estudante do terceiro ano do ensino médio de Ehime, conhece Fukuda Tatsuya, um treinador da "J Youth League". Mesmo que ainda tenha uma personalidade forte, Ashito tem um incrível potêncial que o fez ser convidado pelo treinador Fukuda para participar da seleção de sua equipe em Tóquio. A história do garoto que vai revolucionar o futebol no Japão vai começar.

title.en: Shouwaru Tensai Osananajimi to no Shoubu ni Makete Hatsutaiken o Zenbu Ubawareru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 性悪天才幼馴染との勝負に負けて初体験を全部奪われる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Shouwaru Tensai Osananajimi to no Shoubu ni Makete Hatsutaiken wo Zenbu Ubawareru Hanashi

altTitles.th: เรื่องราวของการพ่ายแพ้การแข่งขันให้กับเพื่อนสมัยเด็กอัจฉริยะตัวร้ายผู้คอยพรากประสบการณ์ครั้งแรกทุกอย่างไป

altTitles.zh: 败给了性格恶劣的天才青梅，初体验全部被夺走这件事

altTitles.zh-hk: 敗給了性格惡劣的天才青梅，初體驗全部被奪走這件事

altTitles.en: How I Lose Bets With My Sadistic Gifted Childhood Friend and She Steals All of My Firsts

description.en:
A twisted girls' love story featuring: A devilish girl hiding behind the mask of an honor student x An ordinary girl who hates losing.

Wakaba Yoshizawa has a childhood friend named Komaki Umezono.

This girl wore the mask of an honor student with good morals who's blessed with both beauty and brains, but in reality she's an evil genius who looked down on people. For the sake of regaining the dignity she lost to Komaki, Wakaba challenges her to a match, but Komaki tells her "Each time I win, I will take one precious thing from you." as a condition!? Every time she loses to the girl she "hates", her true feelings get exposed.

(Source: Young Ace Up)
description.ja:
「嫌い」な彼女に負けるたび、曝け出されるホントの気持ち――。

吉沢わかばの幼馴染、梅園小牧。彼女は、品行方正で才色兼備な優等生の仮面を被った、人を見下す性悪女だった。そんな小牧に奪われた尊厳を取り戻すため、彼女に勝負を挑むわかばだったが、「私が勝ったらわかばの大事なものを一つずつ奪う」という条件をつけられて――!?ファーストキスに始まり、一つ一つ「尊厳」を奪われていく中で、小牧に抱く気持ちが「嫌い」だけでないことに気付きーー？
description.th: อุเมะโซโนะ โคมากิ เพื่อนสมัยเด็กของ โยชิซาวะ วาคาบะ เธอสวมหน้ากากนักเรียนดีเด่นทั้งที่เป็นผู้หญิงชั่วร้าย ที่ชอบดูถูกผู้คน เพื่อกอบกู้ศักดิ์ศรีที่โคมากิแย่งชิงไปจากเธอ วาคาบะ จึงต้องแข่งขันกับเธอ โดยมีเงื่อนไขว่าถ้าชนะ เธอจะพรากสิ่งสำคัญหนึ่งอย่างของวาคาบะไป...!? "ฉันเกลียดเธอ!" ถึงจะเป็นแบบนั้น ทุกครั้งที่พ่ายแพ้ความรู้สึกที่แท้จริงก็ค่อย ๆ ถูกเปิดเผยออกมา
description.es-la:
¡Una distorsionada historia de amor entre la estudiante modelo con una máscara demoníaca y la chica común que no se rinde!

Wakaba Yoshizawa, la amiga de la infancia de Wakaba, Komaizumi Komaki. Ella era una chica malvada que llevaba una máscara de estudiante modelo perfecta y talentosa, que miraba por encima del hombro a los demás. Wakaba desafía a Komaki para recuperar su dignidad que le fue arrebatada, pero se le pone una condición: "Si gano, tomaré una cosa importante de Wakaba una por una" ¡Cada vez que pierde contra ella, revela sus verdaderos sentimientos! ¡Una emocionante historia de amor entre chicas que ganó el Premio de Oro en el 28vo Concurso Sneaker Award, ahora en formato de cómic!
description.pt-br:
Uma história de amor distorcida entre garotas: uma garota diabólica escondida por trás da máscara de uma estudante exemplar x uma garota comum que odeia perder.

Wakaba Yoshizawa tem uma amiga de infância chamada Komaki Umezono.

Essa garota usava a máscara de uma estudante exemplar com boas virtudes, abençoada com beleza e inteligência, mas na realidade ela é uma gênio do mal que despreza as pessoas. Para recuperar a dignidade perdida para Komaki, Wakaba desafia-a para um duelo, mas Komaki lhe diz: "Cada vez que eu ganhar, vou tirar algo precioso de você." como condição!? Cada vez que ela perde para a garota que "odeia", seus verdadeiros sentimentos são expostos.

title.en: Tensei Shite High Elf ni Narimashitaga, Slow Life wa 120-nen de Akimashita

altTitles.ja: 転生してハイエルフになりましたが、スローライフは１２０年で飽きました　-Highelf with a long life-

altTitles.en: I Was Reborn and Became a High Elf, but I Got Tired of My Slow Life after 120 Years
Growing Tired of the Lazy High Elf Life After 120 Years
High Elf with a Long Life
Enough with This Slow Life! I Was Reincarnated as a High Elf and Now I’m Bored

description.en:
Life in the Great Pulha Woodlands is the very definition of stillness and tranquility—and Acer’s had enough of it! That’s right. Acer isn’t quite like the other high elves of the forest. For starters, he remembers living a past life as a human in another world...meaning he’s got a taste for meat, adventure, and plenty of other decidedly un-elven things! He’s also bored out of his skull after 120 years of the peace and quiet of their serene sylvan lifestyle. So with nothing more than his trusty bow, a bundle of life-giving fruit, and his close bond with the spirits of nature, Acer leaves the monotony of the forest behind to seek a new life, one that’s more his pace. See what excitement awaits in the outside world full of humans, dwarves, and even other elves!

* [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/enough-with-this-slow-life-i-was-reincarnated-as-a-high-elf-and-now-i-m-bored)

altTitles.en: MazinSaga

altTitles.ja: マジンサーガ

description.en:
MazinSaga is a manga written and produced by Go Nagai between 1990 and 1998; currently incomplete and up to the sixth volume, it's the summa of Nagai's works, for the complexity of the plot and the treated thematic content.  
Mazinsaga tells the story of the young Koji Kabuto, university student who finds himself having to collect the fruit of the researches of his father, physicist of world-wide reputation who died in mysterious circumstances.  
The boy is thus given a powerful artifact, Mazinger Z, the Armor of God.

altTitles.en: My Favorite salvation girl

description.en: [Translated by Mystic Willow Scans] As Lee Yeo-ju hums a song that comforted her during her long hospital stay, she is approached by an idol star named Park Jae-ha, whom she has only seen in videos. "I'll help you. You need money for the surgery, right?" Jae-ha becomes Yeo-ju's savior and favorite. However, five years later, he ends his life by making an extreme choice... Yeo-ju, in shock, cries out to a shooting star to save him. Did her wish come true? She goes back seven years and possesses the body of Jang Bo-ran, a top idol at the time and a judge on the audition program "I Am the Strongest Idol"... Among the audition participants is trainee Park Jae-ha!"Just like you saved me, I will save you this time."

title.en: Maken Gishi Bacchus: Shinken o Mezasu Tenseisha wa, Kutte Nonde Tsukutte Sugosu

altTitles.ja: 魔剣技師バッカス～神剣を目指す転生者は、喰って呑んで造って過ごす～

altTitles.en: Magic Sword Blacksmith Bacchus: The Reincarnator Who Aims to Forge a Divine Sword Spends His Time Eating, Drinking and Forging
"Bacchus” Blacksmith of Magic Sword

description.en:
A blacksmith reincarnated into another world sets out to forge the ultimate magic sword! Bacchus, a jack-of-all-trades craftsman with memories of his past life, steps into the world of magic and magic technology with the aim of making magic swords. Despite his diverse skills, Bacchus’s magical prowess is expected to cause a lot of trouble, but he doesn't care. He spends his days eating, drinking, crafting magic swords, and occasionally helping others with their problems. While he faces a few complications involving women, Bacchus continues to live his life one day at a time.

---
**Link:**
- Alternative Official Raw -[Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/70493)

altTitles.ja: カテナチオ

altTitles.en: Catenaccio

description.en: Yataro Araki, a member of the Tojo High School soccer team, has big dreams. Within a decade, he sees himself conquering the soccer world’s loftiest peak: European “football!” Fast forward to what may be his last soccer match before graduation, the match that will make or break his dreams. Having thus far failed to attract the attention of scouts, he is now desperate to do whatever it takes to prove himself. Yataro is prepared to get his hands dirty if it means winning. If it means standing at the top! Welcome to the world of international football! Nothing is sacred, no rule is left unbroken! Not when victory is on the line!
description.ja: 東條高校サッカー部に所属する嵐木八咫郎（あらきやたろう）の夢は欧州を制覇し、世界一になること。 高校3年の最後の試合、夢への第1歩、プロ入りを目指しスカウトの目に留まるため奮闘をするが―…。
description.vi: Yataro Araki là thành viên clb bóng đá trường cao trung Tojo. Cậu có ước mơ chinh phục đỉnh cao bóng đá Châu Âu trong 10 năm tới. Thời gian trôi qua, vào trận cuối cùng trước khi tốt nghiệp, và cũng là trận sẽ quyết định giấc mơ của cậu. Mọi thứ sẽ vô nghĩa nếu Araki không được tuyển trạch viên nào để ý đến, vì vậy cậu sẵn lòng làm tất cả mọi thứ, kể cả khi phải chơi bẩn để giành lấy chiến thắng. Nếu nó giúp cậu vươn đến đỉnh cao! Chào mừng đến với giới bóng đá quốc tế! Không tồn tại thứ gọi là bất khả xâm phạm hay luật lệ! Ít nhất là khi chiến thắng đang cận kề!

altTitles.ja: 夏とレモンとオーバーレイ

description.en: A struggling voice actress who goes by the name of Yunimaru is barely making ends meet. Constantly thinking about when she will escape her miserable life, she's contacted by Konno Sayaka—a beautiful and successful woman working for a big company—with a job offer: to read a farewell letter at her own funeral. While grappling with whether or not to accept such an absurd job offer, Sayaka makes her a proposal that she can't refuse. Now with an opportunity to escape her situation, Yunimaru also finds herself aiding Sayaka in the completion of her letter.

title.en: BanG Dream! - AnoSoyo Are Already Dating (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: 忍者と殺し屋のふたりぐらし

altTitles.en: A Ninja and an Assassin Living Together

description.en: Many fatalities?! A naive female ninja and a high school assassin live together in an unpredictable way! A naive female ninja who escapes from a ninja village meets a high school girl assassin!? Their life together, which begins by chance, is full of danger (and excitement)...!
description.ja: 忍びの里から抜け出した世間知らずのくノ一が出会ったのは、女子高生の殺し屋!? ひょんなことから始まった共同生活は危険（ドキドキ）がいっぱい…！
description.ru:
Наивная куноити сбегает из своей деревни ниндзя и встречает школьницу-убийцу!
Начинается непредсказуемая совместная жизнь ниндзя и убийцы★.

altTitles.en: The Morose Mononokean

altTitles.ja: 不機嫌なモノノケ庵

description.en: Ashiya has spent his first seven days of high school stuck in the infirmary because of a youkai attaching itself to him. He ends up asking the owner of a small tea room called the 'Mononokean' for help. This is a tale involving the very morose owner of the Mononokean guiding mononoke that happened to wander into this world go to the next world.
description.es-la: Ashiya ha pasado su primera semana en la secundaria atascado en la enfermería porque un youkai se pegó a él y termina pidiéndole ayuda al dueño de una pequeña sala del té llamada el «Mononokean». Estas son las misteriosas historias que involucran al muy malhumorado dueño del Mononokean guiando a los youkai que vagan en este mundo hacia el siguiente.
